transcript_metadata.topic: Reflecting on themes and comparing to 'Brave New World'

session_analysis.discussion_quality: The discussion was deep and balanced with multiple students contributing thoughtful insights and questions.
key_moments: Casey's philosophical questioning of freedom and happiness sparked an engaging debate.
concerns: None observed; students were inclusive and on-topic.
teacher_recommendations: Continue fostering discussions that connect literature to philosophical and real-world contexts to maintain high engagement.

evidence.quote: No, don't apologize! That's exactly what we should be doing. These are important questions.
